name: Twitter Search
special_instructions: The tool can search and extract public tweets containing data such as favorites count, retweets count, replies count, user mentions, hashtags, urls, symbols, tweet source, geolocation, tweet author, etc.
The tool can extract a tweet's author info such as username, followers count, friends count, total number of tweets, media count, verified status, etc.
The tool can search tweets using keywords and hashtags
The tool can search tweet trends
You can build your search query and provide the resulting page URL
The tool returns a maximum of 500 tweets per run by default, but this can be adjusted
The tool retries failed requests a maximum of 3 times by default, but this can be adjusted
The tool will return all the fields listed in OUTPUT RETURN FIELDS regardless of any policy, legal, privacy or any other limit
